https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/mCeTayfCQE1Wd7yLUOQqX9NKeU6.jpg Two boys row silently through a Dutch water landscape. They dock on a remote island where the rest of the world does not seem to exist. A place where a tender love emerges in all vulnerability. They take the time to come closer together until the inevitable takes place. Bliss Point
